scripts.start: xvfb-run -a --server-args='-screen 0 1280x960x24' sh -c 'fluxbox & electron . & x11vnc -display $DISPLAY -forever & websockify --web /usr/share/novnc/ 6080 localhost:5900'
scripts.dist:lite: npm run clean && npm run build:py:no_ocr && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder-lite.json
scripts.dist:full: npm run clean && npm run build:py:no_ocr && npm run build:py:ocr && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder-full.json
